login.title: Login
login.description: To enter the site, use your email and password provided during registration.

register.title: Register
register.description: Create a new account to start tracking your finances.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Enter your email to reset your password

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: Formats: JPEG, PNG, WEBP, GIF. Max. size: 10 MB.

account.title: Account
account.passowrd_description: Your password is the key to your account. Don't share it with anyone. If necessary, you can change it here for increased security.

system.title: System
system.language_description: Select the interface language for ease of use.

actions.title: Actions
actions.logout_description: Log out to sign out of your account on this device.
